name: Safari Retro
description:
Directions:
* The lower half of the screen controls cage movement *
* The upper half of the screen shuts the cage door to capture the animal *
* Or alternatively, use an iCade compatible controller *

Are you a great hunter? Control the cage to chase the computer controlled wild animals across the electronic jungle. Capture as many lions, tigers, gorillas, crocodiles, snakes, elephants, hippos, giraffes, moose, gnus to score as many points as you can in the 90 second limit. But beware, if you miss you will earn a points penalty!
